Text: Not that I am complaining, but out of curiosity, why are these being uploaded so much later (8-10 hrs after airing) than they previously were?  Thank you very much, by the way.
Thanks for the upload, but x264 doesn't play on on external digital media players - please go back to .avi.
x264 absolutely does play on external digital media players, it just doesn't play on *your* external digital media player. If it's not working for you why not just convert them to avi's yourself?

Search Wondershare Media Converter. 
Works great.

@wenex it doesn't play on mine either.
VTV please go back to MP4, there a no other uploaders doing this show and AVI is good for everybody, not just those that choose to watch it on their computer.

What a splendid idea. Why don't we all just go back to black and white while we're at it.

Thank you for uploading these, no matter how many hours ater.
